mapper.select: SELECT * FROM SMALL_CATEGORY S LEFT OUTER JOIN BIG_CATEGORY B ON S.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = B.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE B.BIG_CATEGORY_CONTENT=#{category}
SELECT RENAMEDFILENAME,REVIEW_NO FROM REVIEW_IMAGE WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{no} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO
SELECT * FROM REVIEW R LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE R.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} ORDER BY R.REVIEW_NO
SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE I LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO =#{productNo}

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT P JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO WHERE I.PRODUCT_PIC IN
#{item}

SELECT * FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE I JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN BIG_CATEGORY B ON P.BIG_CATEGORY_NO = B.BIG_CATEGORY_NO
WHERE SALE_PER IS NOT NULL
WHERE B.BIG_CATEGORY_CONTENT = #{category}
WHERE B.BIG_CATEGORY_CONTENT = #{category} AND SALE_PER IS NOT NULL
SELECT PRODUCT_NO, AVG(PRODUCT_GRADE),COUNT(REVIEW_NO) FROM REVIEW WHERE PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO
SELECT * FROM SHOWROOM WHERE ROOM_CATEGORY=#{type}

SELECT * FROM ROOMS E JOIN PRODUCT R ON E.PRODUCT_NO= R.PRODUCT_NO JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE J ON E.PRODUCT_NO= J.PRODUCT_NO JOIN SHOWROOM Q ON Q.ROOM_NO= E.ROOM_NO
WHERE ROOM_CATEGORY= #{type} AND J.PRODUCT_COLOR='normal'
WHERE Q.ROOM_NO= #{typeTo} AND J.PRODUCT_COLOR='normal'
SELECT * FROM ROOMS E JOIN PRODUCT R ON E.PRODUCT_NO= R.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE J ON E.PRODUCT_NO= J.PRODUCT_NO WHERE E.ROOM_NO=#{type} AND J.PRODUCT_COLOR='normal'
SELECT * FROM ROOMS_TITLE WHERE ROOM_CATEGORY=#{type}
SELECT COUNT(*)FROM PRODUCT E JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE J ON E.PRODUCT_NO= J.PRODUCT_NO WHERE J.PRODUCT_COLOR='normal'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM PRODUCT E JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE J ON E.PRODUCT_NO= J.PRODUCT_NO JOIN BIG_CATEGORY T ON T.BIG_CATEGORY_NO=E.BIG_CATEGORY_NO WHERE J.PRODUCT_COLOR='normal' AND E.SALE_PER IS NOT NULL)WHERE ROWNUM <2
mapper.update: UPDATE SHOWROOM SET ROOM_PIC = #{roomsImg} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{categoryNo} AND ROOM_CATEGORY = #{category}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRODUCT A WHERE A.PRODUCT_NO NOT IN (SELECT B.PRODUCT_NO FROM ROOMS B)

SELECT *FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRODUCT_NO in
#{type}
SELECT *FROM ROOMS
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCT SET PRODUCT_STOCK=#{stock} WHERE PRODUCT_NO=#{no}
mapper.select: select sale_per from product where product_no=#{productNo}
